references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of neural radiance fields and directly addresses a key challenge in novel view synthesis—anti-aliasing—which the current paper builds upon and aims to improve upon.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: As an extension to the original Mip-NeRF, it further improves the robustness and applicability of neural radiance fields, which are implicitly compared to Gaussian splatting in the current paper.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces Gaussian splatting, the core method that the current work directly builds upon and aims to improve.

references.paper_title: 2D Gaussian splatting for geometrically accurate radiance fields
references.reason: This paper offers a refined variant of Gaussian splatting (2D version) that the current paper draws upon and contrasts against in terms of limitations and accuracy.

references.paper_title: FreGS: 3D Gaussian splatting with progressive frequency regularization
references.reason: This paper offers another recent improvement to Gaussian splatting that is directly compared against in the current paper to show improvement.
